clinical_study.brief_title: Evalution of Optical Enhancement With Magnification for Polyop Histology
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of a New Image-enhanced Endoscopic Technology With Magnification Using I-scan Optical Enhancement for Prediction Colorectal Polyp Histology

brief_summary.textblock: When a polyp is found, it woulf be recorded by a white-light and OE1 model with magnification for assessing and predicting its histology. After that, its really histology will be reported by an pathologist.

primary_outcome.measure: Diagnostic accuracy of OE with magnification on predicting colorectal polyp histology

secondary_outcome.measure: Comparison of accuracy between magnification with or without OE on polyp assessment
sensitivity and specificity for adenomatous histology of colorectal polyps.

arm_group.description: The polyps found will be observed by HDWL and OE with magnicication model and recorded.

intervention.intervention_name: HDWL with magnification and OE with magnification
intervention.description: The polyps found will be observed carefully and recorded by HDWL with magnification and then OE with magnification.

study_pop.textblock: Patients who experence an examation of coloscopy found polyps.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients will be included if they are found polyps during endoscopy procesure.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Inflammatory bowel disease
- Biopsies were not available.
- Unable to provide informed consent.

facility.name: Department of Gastroenterology, Qilu Hospital, Shandong University
